mapper.sql: reco.id AS reco_id, reco.job_id AS reco_job_id, reco.sh_id AS reco_sh_id, reco.resume_id AS reco_resume_id, reco.apply_time AS reco_apply_time, reco.validation AS reco_validation, reco.member_id AS reco_member_id, reco.memo AS reco_memo, reco.order_index AS reco_order_index, reco.pass_time AS reco_pass_time, reco.remove_time AS reco_remove_time
mapper.select:
select
FROM recommended_post reco where reco.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update recommended_post set job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sh_id = #{shId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, validation = #{validation,jdbcType=BIT}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_index = #{orderIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pass_time = #{passTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remove_time = #{removeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT , ,
FROM recommended_post reco
INNER JOIN job_post post ON post.id = reco.job_id
INNER JOIN second_hand_post post ON post.id = reco.sh_id
INNER JOIN resume re ON re.id = reco.resume_id
INNER JOIN member mem ON mem.id = reco.member_id WHERE
reco.job_id IS NOT NULL
reco.sh_id IS NOT NULL
reco.resume_id IS NOT NULL
AND reco.validation = true ORDER BY reco.order_index ASC LIMIT #{pageNumber}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommended_post reco WHERE
reco.job_id IS NOT NULL
reco.sh_id IS NOT NULL
reco.resume_id IS NOT NULL
AND reco.validation = true
